content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I was created and I received a command to execute a shell command to write "I am a river" to a file called "river.txt". The command was successfully executed with no output or errors.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='assistant', content='{\'thoughts\': {\'text\': \'I will check the contents of the file "river.txt" to ensure that it contains the text "I am a river".\', \'reasoning\': \'I need to verify that the previous command executed successfully and that the file contains the expected text.\', \'plan\': \'- Use the "read_file" command to read the contents of "river.txt".\\n- Check if the contents match the expected text.\\n- If the contents match, output a success message. If not, output an error message.\', \'criticism\': \'I could have added a check to ensure that the file exists before reading it.\', \'speak\': \'I have successfully written "I am a river" to the file "river.txt".\'}, \'command\': {\'name\': \'read_file\', \'args\': {\'filename\': \'river.txt\'}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command read_file returned: I am a river\n', type='action_result')]
"""
